about_the_game:
Chaotic local couch co-op/pvp warfare madness incoming!

Be ready to have a great gaming party night with your friend in this 4v4 strategic couch co-op fighting action packed game! Each team has 3 treasure chests that they need to fill with gold coins and protect from the enemy that might try to explode the treasure with a bomb!

5 minutes round cycling through the current 8 maps available in the game. First team to win 5 round win the game

PICK A CHARACTER!
Pick your favorite character and jump in the warfare!



FARM GOLD
Convert rock into gold at the mining table!



PUNCH!
When you get punched you lose what you currently have in your hand so be careful! Having a sword in your hand increase your punch range and stun the enemy on hit



SHOOT!
With a gun equipped, you can shoot and stun your target from a distance



FILL TREASURE
Put the gold in your team treasures and protect them! The first team with a gold coin secured in all their treasure chest win the round



DESTROY TREASURE
The other way to win a round is by placing a bomb on a treasure chest of the opposing team. If they don't remove the bomb in time they lose the round!

ENVIRONMENT

4 thematics - 8 maps (more on the way!)
Every map has a unique configuration that changes the way you play and the strategy available to win the round!

CHARACTERS

20 playable characters
Purely cosmetic but we never know maybe one day they will have their unique abilities or special stats?! Pick your favorite one and jump in the warfare!



Simple controls : everyone can play!
The goal is to have a fun game to play for gaming night with family and friends! Where pro gamer and newbies can have a great time Laughing, yelling and eating their favorite meal together while enjoying a fun co-op/competitive action party game!

COMPATIBLE WITH "REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER" STEAM FEATURE

(So yes you can do a game online with your friends!)
But this is against the purpose of this game! You will miss the opportunity to do an awesome gaming experience so do it at your own risk!

ARE YOU READY FOR THE COUCH WARFARE?
Pick up your controller and call your friend. It's time for a great gaming party!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Local 8 players action-party-game in which players compete to control the gold nuggets! Turn those nuggets into coins at the working station and secure them in your team treasure chest! Or use bombs to destroy your enemy treasure chest?! 4v4 chaotic gameplay (perfect for party gaming night!)
